column4: Guys, what are some laptops that Ubuntu runs really well on without a lot of fuss?
a lot of people use thinkpads here.  They need to be > t2?
I have an SL300 but I guess they aren't "real" thinkpads, different architechture
I don't have any experience with the really new non-t series like SL, but the more modern thinkpads seem to work very well.  However, the really old ones don't work that well.
